83:2: al-la-zee-na  i-zak  taa-loo  a-lan  naa-si   yas-taw-foon
83:7: kal-laaa  in-na  ki-taa-bal  fuj-jaa-ri  lafee  sij-jeen
83:12: wa-maa  yu-kaz-zi-bu  biheee  il-laa  kul-lu  mu-ta-din  aseem
83:13: i-zaa  tut-laa  a-lai-hi  aayaa-tu-naa  qaa-la  a-saa-tee-rul  aw-waleen
83:14: kal-laa  bal  raa-na  a-laa  qu-loo-bi-him  maa  kaa-noo  yak-si-boon
83:15: kal-laaa  in-na-hum  ar   rab-bi-him  yaw-mai-zil  la-mah-joo-boon
83:17: sum-ma  yu-qaa-lu  haa-zal  lazee    kun-tum  bihee  tu-kaz-zi-boon
83:18: kal-laaa  in-na  ki-taa-bal  ab-raa-ri  lafee  il-liyyeen
83:26: khi-taa-mu-hoo  misk     wafee   zaa-li-ka  fa-lya-ta-naa-fa-sil  mu-ta-naa-fi-soon
83:29: in-nal  lazee-na   aj-ra-moo  kaa-noo  mi-nal  lazee-na   aa-ma-noo  ya-dha-koon
83:31: wai-zan  qa-la-booo  i-laaa  ah-li-hi-mun  qa-la-boo  fa-kiheen
83:32: wai-zaa  raa-whum  qaa-looo  in-na  haaau-laaai   la-daaal-loon
83:34: fa-lyaw-mal  lazee-na   aa-ma-noo  mi-nal  kuf-faa-ri  ya-dha-koon
